p: To simulate the dengue epidemic in Cebu City, hospital data containing all hospitalized dengue cases in 2010 were applied. The datasets were provided by the City Health office in Cebu City for use in this project ( S1 File). The human population was defined according to the Cebu City population of 2010, based on data of the Philippine Census [ 46]. All model parameters are listed in Table 1, the computations are presented in S2 File. Parameters derived by calibration are marked accordingly. The calibration process is described thereafter.
